title: gOvindaraja perumahan
sahitya:
gOvinda rAja perumAn aruL purivAn koNDa kAriyam veTri kaNDu

manamagizh 



anupallavi



dEvargaL sEvikkum tillai naTarAjan cirsabhaik-kUttinai utsAgamAga

pArkkum  



caraNam 1



kOTi arakkar paDai kUDi edirta pOdum kOdaNDattAl avar kulattai vEr aruttavan

vADiya dharmattai vAnena vaLarppavan vAzhaiyaDi vAzhaiyAl vandu

nammaik-kAppavan



caraNam 2



konjum kuzhalOshaiyAl nenjai aLLIk-kalandu gOpiyarin

Atmat-tApattai tIrta kaNNan

venjamariDai shOrnda vijayan urudi pera vEda vEdAnta jnAna gItai uraitta vIran
